title: Conklin Duragraph Forest Green Fountain Pen, Stub Nib (CK71320)
features: COMMITMENT TO EXCELLENCE: The Conklin Duragraph Fountain Pen is a testament to the Conklin company's commitment to excellence and innovation in the field of writing. Established in 1898, Conklin is a trusted manufacturer of high-quality writing instruments.

DESIGNED AS AN HEIRLOOM this durable pen is sure to last for generationsDURABLE, HIGH-QUALITY WRITING INSTRUMENT: Included in the package is one Conklin Duragraph Fountain Pen in sweet Amber, a durable, high-quality writing instrument that's perfect for calligraphy, journaling, or everyday writing.
INTRICATE DESIGN: The pen features intricate, complex patterns that add depth and dimension to its unique design, making it a stylish and functional addition to any collection.
AN HEIRLOOM PIECE: The Duragraph Fountain Pen is designed as an heirloom piece, built to last for generations, making it an excellent investment for anyone who values quality and craftsmanship.
description: The Conklin Duragraph Fountain Pen is a true classic that has been reimagined for the modern era. Originally launched in 1923, the Duragraph was known as 'the definitive' pen, and its name was derived from a combination of "durable" and "graph." The pen was created with durability and longevity in mind, making it an excellent choice for anyone who values quality craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The Duragraph Fountain Pen is designed to last as an heirloom for many generations, and its oversize flat top design brings a fresh, modern style to the timeless classic. The intricate, complex patterns on the pen's body add depth and dimension to the design, making it a true work of art. The sweet Amber color of the pen is particularly eye-catching, and it's sure to stand out in any collection. One of the key features of the Conklin Duragraph Fountain Pen is its convenient filling options. The pen comes with an included converter that allows you to fill it with your favorite ink, or you can use international cartridges for even greater convenience. This makes refilling the pen quick and easy, so you can spend more time writing and less time fussing with your fountain pen. The sleek presentation box that comes with the Duragraph Fountain Pen adds an extra touch of luxury and protection. The box is perfect for storing your pen when it's not in use, or for displaying it in your collection. It's also an excellent way to protect your pen if you're traveling with it. Made by the renowned Conklin company, which has been crafting high-quality writing instruments since 1898, the Duragraph Fountain Pen is a testament to the company's commitment to excellence and innovation in the field of writing. Whether you're a professional writer, artist, or collector, the Conklin Duragraph Fountain Pen is an excellent choice for anyone who appreciates the art of writing. It's a true work of art that's designed to be used and enjoyed for many years to come.
